name: AgentWallet
tagline: Multi-chain USDC wallet skill for AI agents
description: Give your AI agents financial superpowers. Create wallets, check balances, transfer USDC, and bridge cross-chain using Circle's CCTP V2 Fast Transfer (~6 second attestations).

create.description: Generate new HD wallet with addresses for all chains
create.output: Returns seed phrase (save securely!) and addresses for Solana, Base, Ethereum

addresses.description: Show wallet addresses for all supported chains
addresses.output: Displays Solana, Base, and Ethereum addresses derived from your seed

balance.description: Check USDC and native token balances
balance.output: Shows ETH/SOL balance + USDC balance per chain

transfer.description: Send USDC or native tokens on same chain

bridge.description: Bridge USDC between chains using CCTP V2 Fast Transfer
bridge.speed: ~50 seconds total (~6 second attestation with Fast Transfer)
bridge.note: Uses Circle CCTP V2 with minFinalityThreshold: 1000 for fast attestations

WALLET_SEED_PHRASE.example: word1 word2 word3 word4 word5 word6 word7 word8 word9 word10 word11 word12

quick_start: 4. Save seed phrase to .env: WALLET_SEED_PHRASE="your words here"
7. Transfer: node scripts/wallet.js transfer base USDC 1 0x...
8. Bridge: node scripts/wallet.js bridge base ethereum 1

demo.title: Multi-Agent USDC Payments
demo.description: Two AI agents (Alice & Bob) sending USDC to each other

agent_prompt: You have access to AgentWallet for managing USDC across chains. Use 'balance' to check funds, 'transfer <chain> <token> <amount> <address>' for same-chain transfers, 'bridge <from> <to> <amount>' for cross-chain. Supported chains: ethereum, base, solana. Fast Transfer bridges complete in ~50 seconds.
